name: Thomas Greene
summary: Experienced ML engineer passionate about building resilient and explainable ML systems. I thrive at the intersection of recommender systems, MLOps, and applied deep learning. Known for shipping fast, mentoring junior engineers, and leading cross-functional AI initiatives from ideation to impact.

Managed 5-person ML team, collaborating with infra, product, and design.
